name: Photobooth Strip
description: Display images in a classic photobooth strip style (3 photos)

setImages.description: Set all 3 images at once { images: [{ url, name? }] }

setImage1.description: Set first image { url: string, name?: string }

setImage2.description: Set second image { url: string, name?: string }

setImage3.description: Set third image { url: string, name?: string }

imageSelected.description: Receive image from Gallery - fills next empty slot { id, url, name }

galleryChanged.description: Receive all images from Gallery { images: [] }

setTitle.description: Set the title text at top of strip

imagesSet.description: Emitted when images are set { images: [], count: number }

slotClicked.description: Emitted when a slot is clicked { slot: number, image: { url, name } }
